body:
I have a feeling that we're supposed to be hating on the friend but... c'mon, if the mom is into him and he is into her, then sorry bud, you're out of luck!
"But muh mom, though!"
Yeah well, fuck off.
Anyway. Art may be dated, but the story is pretty interesting so far!
First hmanga I've read that has a JAV based off on it. URE-002
which came out before ,Rakujitso Pathos or this one coz one of them surely got "inspired" of the other's art form
@bbdo yea coming back to this I really do agree with you

Just for a general comment, since I do not want to discuss what is going to happen in the future volumes and avoid spoilers for new readers, I just have to say that this was an incredible experience reading it as a story and erotic fap material, Tsuya Tsuya just has that simple old school artwork that hits some really intense erotic levels. This story dives deep into why the characters do what they do. The tags and fetishes are not there for just the sake of kink but to help drive the story. Just read it and see how it turns out, I am sure most will enjoy the story. I am bothered by the decisions made by the characters, but we are at least given backgrounds that explain said decisions.
Great work, live adaptation is URE-002
